documents.title: Artificial Intelligence
documents.content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) refers to the simulation of human intelligence in machines that are programmed to think and learn.

documents.title: Machine Learning
documents.content: Machine Learning is a subset of AI that focuses on building systems that learn from data to make predictions or decisions.

documents.title: Natural Language Processing
documents.content: Natural Language Processing (NLP) is a branch of AI that helps computers understand, interpret, and respond to human language.

documents.title: Neural Networks
documents.content: Neural Networks are a series of algorithms that mimic the operations of a human brain to recognize patterns and solve problems.

documents.title: Data Science
documents.content: Data Science combines domain expertise, programming skills, and knowledge of mathematics and statistics to extract meaningful insights from data.
